it.could.webdav
Class XMLRepository

java.lang.Object
  it.could.webdav.DAVRepository
      it.could.webdav.XMLRepository

public class XMLRepository
extends DAVRepository

A DAVRepository instance enforcing all DAVResources to be XML files.
